tool_description: Returns the Google's BERT score of a given text against a specific keyword.
name: SEO BERT Score
title: SEO BERT Score

api_list.name: SEO BERT Score
api_list.description: Returns the Google's BERT score of a given text against a specific keyword.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://seo-bert-score.p.rapidapi.com/service/bert-score"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "seo-bert-score.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://seo-bert-score.p.rapidapi.com/service/bert-score"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
